bill.title: Motorcycle distinctive license tag; revise various provisions.
bill.description: An Act Relating To Personalized And Distinctive License Tags For Motorcycles; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-35, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provides For License Tags For Motorcycles, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-47.1, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags For Antique Motorcycles, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-48, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Personalized License Tags, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-49, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special Motorcycle License Tags For Members Of Shrine Motorcycle Clubs, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Persons With Disabilities, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Pearl Harbor Survivors And Purple Heart Recipients, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Persons Who Are Deaf, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.14, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Special License Tags To Grand Lodge Of Mississippi Members And The Families Of Deceased Members, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; To Bring Forward Section 27-19-56.125, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Authorizes The Issuance Of Distinctive Motorcycle License Tags To Veterans Of The Armed Forces, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
